title: DevOps Engineer
body:
DevOps Engineer
Describe the technical systems and processes used to ensure the ability to do continuous updates and integration of software.

- Describe software and programming tools
    - Identify authoring tools (IDE’s, Docker, GitHub) used
    - Describe and/or show visuals of interactions and integration of programming languages, protocols, and data within project. For instance, deployed systems of Docker Images, Nginx, DNS hosting the application.
    - Describe and/or illustrate key Web Applications, APIs, and dependency systems that will be required to complete this system (Diagram).
- Describe GitHub branch management and sociology used to ensure ability to perform continuous builds and integrations.
    - GitHub projects
    - Branching Strategies
    - Deployment processes and automation
- Describe how to validate and test the complete system
- My suggestion is this person helps with Backend development

title: [DevOps] Configure Automated Deployments
body:
There are 3 types of branches: feature, development, master. 
For each ticket we are creating branch feature/RE-(ticket number).
Feature branch is created fron develop branch. 
When feature branch is pushed to the repository validation(check-only) deloyment is running on production org.
When branch is ready to review (ticket) is merged to develop branch.
When develop branch is merged to master (at the end of the sprint) the actual deplyment is running to production. Each deployment (actual and validation) should have test level runlocaltests.

title: [Remoto] Senior DevOps Engineer
Guide for devops/bash scripts
body:
# What?
In addition to the scripts that are used in the deployment guides, i.e.:
| archipelago-deployment | archipelago-deployment-live |
| --- | --- |
| [esmero/archipelago-deployment/scripts/archipelago/deploy.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment/blob/1.0.0/scripts/archipelago/deploy.sh) | [esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/drupal/scripts/archipelago/deploy.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/blob/1.0.0/drupal/scripts/archipelago/deploy.sh) |
| [esmero/archipelago-deployment/scripts/archipelago/setup.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment/blob/1.0.0/scripts/archipelago/setup.sh) | [esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/drupal/scripts/archipelago/setup.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/blob/1.0.0/drupal/scripts/archipelago/setup.sh) |
| [esmero/archipelago-deployment/scripts/archipelago/update.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment/blob/1.0.0/scripts/archipelago/update.sh) | [esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/drupal/scripts/archipelago/update.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/blob/1.0.0/drupal/scripts/archipelago/update.sh) |
| [esmero/archipelago-deployment/scripts/archipelago/update_deployed.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment/blob/1.0.0/scripts/archipelago/update_deployed.sh) | [esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/drupal/scripts/archipelago/update_deployed.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment-live/blob/1.0.0/drupal/scripts/archipelago/update_deployed.sh) |

there are two utility scripts that could use some documentation:
| archipelago-deployment | archipelago-deployment-live |
| --- | --- |
| [esmero/archipelago-deployment/scripts/archipelago/devops/auto_deploy.sh](https://github.com/esmero/archipelago-deployment/blob/1.0.0/scripts/archipelago/devops/auto_deploy.sh) | N/A |
| N/A | esmero/archipelago-deployment-live#82 |

The `auto_deploy.sh` script has a README, but a comprehensive overview  of all the scripts and details on each might be helpful. The `import_export.sh` script hasn't been merged yet and still needs improvements and possibly more testing.

## Descrição da vaga: Esta é uma vaga de um parceiro da plataforma Coodesh, ao candidatar-se você terá acesso as informações completas sobre a empresa e benefícios. Fique atento ao redirecionamento que vai te levar para uma url [https://coodesh.com](https://coodesh.com/vagas/devops-142901455?utm_source=github&utm_medium=devfsa-vagas&modal=open) com o pop-up personalizado de candidatura. 👋

A Samba está buscando DevOps para compor seu time!

Procuramos alguém com propósito forte e que esteja disposta a trabalhar em ambiente colaborativo e dinâmico, pronto para crescer profissionalmente junto com a nossa equipe fora da curva! A Samba gosta de fazer a diferença sempre e nosso time é o responsável para que isto aconteça! Por isso, a gente espera que você seja uma pessoa apaixonada por tecnologia, assim com a gente! Todas as nossas vagas também se aplicam a pessoas com deficiência, então fique à vontade para se candidatar!

Responsabilidades:

  • Criar, implantar e manter a infraestrutura de aplicações utilizando infraestrutura como código (IaC);
  • Monitoramento e manutenção de aplicações de alta disponibilidade e escalabilidade;
  • Configuração de servidores Linux;
  • Configuração de web servers (Nginx, apache);
  • Estimar o custo de infraestrutura de aplicações;
  • Propor soluções e melhorias de infraestrutura;
  • Otimizar a utilização de recursos Cloud;
  • Automatização de processos.

## Samba Tech:

A Sambatech é uma das empresas mais inovadoras do mundo, segundo a Fast Company, e é referência no mercado de vídeos online. Nossa empresa garante infraestrutura de alta qualidade para venda, distribuição, gerenciamento e armazenamento de vídeos e ajuda pessoas e empresas a terem mais sucesso, independentemente do seu objetivo.

Com suas soluções, a Samba atende diferentes tipos de necessidades relacionadas aos conteúdos audiovisuais e possui uma equipe totalmente focada em assegurar que nossos clientes tenham acesso ao que há de melhor em tecnologia para vídeos online.   

Veja mais no site ## Habilidades: - AWS - Terraform - Docker ## Local: 100% Remoto ## Requisitos: - Conhecimento em AWS; - Conhecimento em infraestrutura como código, preferencialmente Terraform; - Gerenciamento de pipeline CI/CD; - Container de aplicação (Docker); - Scripts bash ou alguma linguagem de programação (Python/Java/Node); - Controle de versão (Git). ## Diferenciais: - Kubernetes Engine; - Arquitetura Serverless; - Protocolo de Streaming. ## Como se candidatar: Candidatar-se exclusivamente através da plataforma Coodesh no link a seguir: [DevOps na Samba Tech](https://coodesh.com/vagas/devops-142901455?utm_source=github&utm_medium=devfsa-vagas&modal=open) Após candidatar-se via plataforma Coodesh e validar o seu login, você poderá acompanhar e receber todas as interações do processo por lá. Utilize a opção **Pedir Feedback** entre uma etapa e outra na vaga que se candidatou. Isso fará com que a pessoa **Recruiter** responsável pelo processo na empresa receba a notificação. ## Labels #### Alocação Remoto #### Regime CLT #### Categoria DevOps

title: Support changelogs from Azure DevOps
body:
### What would you like Renovate to be able to do?

Fetch changelogs from Azure DevOps and add the changelog to the PR.

### If you have any ideas on how this should be implemented, please tell us here.

Changelog fetching is already implemented for [GitHub](https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate/tree/main/lib/workers/repository/update/pr/changelog/github) and [GitLab](https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate/tree/main/lib/workers/repository/update/pr/changelog/gitlab). So we could implement something analog for Azure DevOps using the [Azure DevOps Services REST API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/?view=azure-devops-rest-7.1).

Implementing this could be blocked by #14138 though.

### Is this a feature you are interested in implementing yourself?

Yes

title: feat: add devops dir
body:
### Description
Adds a `devops` directory added to `vega_sim` containing the following:

- `run.py` - runs a specified configured scenario on a specified network
- `registry.py` - contains a dict with various scenario configurations which can be run
- `scenario.py` - contains the scenario which can be run
- `wallet.py` - contains information about the wallet and keys to use when running a scenario
- `readme.md` - a WIP readme file

The directory will allow devops to run `vega-market-sim` bots on various markets and networks.

### Testing
None yet.

title: Add content to DevOps roadmap

[DevOps Roadmap](https://roadmap.sh/devops) has been made interactive, but it is missing content in some roadmap nodes. We need to fill the [markdown files given here](https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap/tree/master/content/roadmaps/102-devops/content) with a short introduction to the topic mentioned in the markdown file and add some resources as [per the guidelines here](https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap/blob/master/contributing.md#adding-content).

**Note** — You don't have to fill all the markdown files simultaneously. Feel free to create separate pull requests with batches of changes (e.g. fill up 10 content files in each PR).

title: DevOps Workflows
body:
Setup a script for ci.yml, deploy.yml and an optional publish.yml The goal of ci.yml is to build and run the tests. If these fail then that prevents the deploy.yml from running. ci.yml runs anytime code is checked into a branch. deploy.yml runs anytime code is merged into main and this triggers a redeployment of the app to Vercel.

Note: this task is dependent on the app already being setup with Vercel (deployable).

title: devops: request and create Opensearch within CERN
DEVOPS-4696: Temporary fix
body:
Proosition of fix,

Problem during run application throws an Error

```
Error: could not execute revoke query: pq: tuple concurrently updated
based on investigation problem occur during revoking permission on schema/database/...
```

below an example of failed query

`REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON SCHEMA "public" FROM "test_multi_aaaa5"`

This operation revoking permissions needs to be thread safe 
https://www.postgresql.org/message-id/967138.1634322291@sss.pgh.pa.us

In the current design thread safe is guranteed on the transcation lock

https://github.com/Worldremit/terraform-provider-postgresql/blob/d03ab426840b5a4169afed7a3d42c9680e330d0e/postgresql/resource_postgresql_grant.go#L149


but it transaction lock is really based on uniq id (bigint) taken from the role, so if you have one role with multiple grants it will fail
https://github.com/Worldremit/terraform-provider-postgresql/blob/d03ab426840b5a4169afed7a3d42c9680e330d0e/postgresql/helpers.go#L466

its just dummy fix for tests, after discussion with DB's we consider removing transaction and move synchronization entire to code

Added only test which shows problem. It doesn't work properly because of

https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-sdk/issues/536

it should be rewritten
